letters.description: Conducting a comprehensive assessment of the client's physiological tension and current cognitive state.
Teaching radical acceptance of the present moment to reduce resistance to difficult emotions or thoughts.
Implementing breathwork and grounding techniques to balance the autonomic nervous system and reduce reactivity.
Investigating the root causes of mental narratives and identifying recurring psychological triggers through guided inquiry.
Utilizing cognitive defusion to help the client detach from limiting beliefs and ego-driven stories.
Integrating mindfulness practices into daily routines to ensure sustainable behavioral change and long-term resilience.
